2. Tutorial: Viewer BasicsÂ¶

Length: ca. 10 min

This tutorial, is based on the PC Viewer Setup and in case you have aces, to the Oculus Viewer Setup guide.

It will introduce the basics of the Radii Viewer. Afterward you will be able to explore a 3D model with the Radii viewer.

Keyboard Assignments

Movement

W,A,S,D

Jump

Space

Shift

Sprint

Q Fly

Up

E Fly

Down

Right Mouse

Main Menus (open,close)

Left Mouse

Operation Menu

1. Open the Radii Viewer

2. Open the Main Menu

Right-click to open & close the Connect Menu.

3. Connect to channel

Connect to the channel as described in section 3 of the Connect Menu by writing the Channelname, the Nickname and pressing connect.

4. Congratulation

You are now connected to a channel and can explore the model.
